alt_text: Blood of the Iron Bull - Specific Location Fright Cliff.jpg
summary_promot:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Metadata:
            - Document Title: Blood of the Iron Bull
            - Section Title: Blood of the Iron Bull Locations
            - Sub-Section Title: Blood of the Iron Bull Location 9

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "# Blood of the Iron Bull


Blood of the Iron Bull materials can be used at the Shrines to upgrade your Spirits. Higher upgrades for them require more Blood of the Iron Bull materials, so it is important to find as many as you can.

If you are keen to know which Spirits you should level up, be sure to check out our guide on the best Spirits to use in the game, and for all their locations, visit our page on the Spirit Locations.

## Blood of the Iron Bull Locations

Below, you can find a guide to each Blood of the Iron Bull location within the early-game, the majority of which are in chests or found from defeating bosses.









### Blood of the Iron Bull Location 9

The next material is in a chest on the right from the Fright Cliff \- Rockrest Flat Shrine in Yellow Wind Ridge. Directly on your right from the Shrine, you can find an enemy up the stairs here as well as a chest. The chest has the Blood of the Iron Bull."
            - Following Text: ""

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
            3. Incorporate any relevant metadata (e.g., section or document titles) to improve coherence, **but do not assume any domain-specific knowledge** unless explicitly stated.
            4. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.



            Output Format:
            Preceding Text Summary:
            Provide a concise summary of the preceding text that gives context to the image.
            Image Summary:
            Provide a summary of the image, describing its purpose and content based on the context.
            Following Text Summary:
            Provide a concise summary of the following text that elaborates on the information related to the image.

The preceding text introduces the concept of "Blood of the Iron Bull" materials, which are used to upgrade Spirits at Shrines in the game. It emphasizes the importance of collecting these materials for higher-level upgrades and provides guidance on finding them, including defeating bosses or locating chests. The section transitions into a list of specific locations where these materials can be found.

Image Summary:
The image appears to depict an in-game environment related to "Blood of the Iron Bull Location 9." It shows a player character standing in a rugged, outdoor area with tall grass, rocky terrain, and a shrine-like structure in the background. The scene aligns with the description of the location near the Fright Cliff - Rockrest Flat Shrine in Yellow Wind Ridge, where players can find a chest containing the material.

Following Text Summary:
The following text specifies that the chest containing the "Blood of the Iron Bull" material is located directly to the right of the shrine. It also mentions an enemy positioned up the stairs near the chest, providing additional context for navigating this location.
